snippet.title: Dragons Lair II: Time Warp [HD Trailer]
snippet.description: The sequel to the arcade smash, Dragons Lair, Time Warp takes place years after the original. Dirk has married Daphne, and the marriage has produced many children. When Daphne is kidnapped by the evil wizard Mordroc in order to be forced into marriage, Dirk's children and his mother-in-law are clearly upset by the abduction of Daphne, and Dirk must once again save her. Released in June 1991, followed by a third game entitled  Dragon's Lair III: The Curse of Mordread
